data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Chiapas who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chiapas, Mexico
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Chiapas, Mexico to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 445,378 believers in the state of Chiapas to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 3,605,309 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Japanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Chiapas, Mexico to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,804,822 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 445,378 believers in the state of Chiapas.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chiapas, Mexico has a population of 4,250,200.

We estimate Chiapas has 445,378 people who might know Jesus, 3,605,309 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 199,513 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Chiapas prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
